website_summaries.verdict: For those who want a very inexpensive LiPo charger, this one is worth considering, but it has limitations including less battery compatibility and a long charge time for some batteries.
pros: Universal – works with most LiPo, LiFE, and Lilon batteries
Has a green indicator light when a full charge is reached
cons: Won't work for as many different battery types as others on our list, but for the value price you may not mind
With a power supply of 800mAh, it can take several hours to charge

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lipo travel charger.
customer_reviews.text: This is an effortless worry free lipo charger. Sometimes I check the 4 cells with a multimeter and they are always exactly the same with this balance charger. It never has an error Beep or flashing light. It makes no noise. A red light simply changes to green when it is finished balancing and charging. All you need is the correct type of balance plug that has the two little ribs on one side . The charger is very light weight - it does get quite warm so I often let it hang off the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Rob S.

customer_reviews.title: Good budget battery charger
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well, i've used it to charge a 4s and a 2s battery (not at the same time). Somewhat slow charging given its a 1C charger, but likely the safest for the battery. Came with a wall charger. Had a drone propellar destroy the balance charger on a battery, and when re-wiring it I placed one of the lines in the wrong spot, the reverse polarity protection worked well and flashed green/red until I broke out a voltmeter to further check and when realigned it worked well. Gets slightly warm with use, but works well for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Avengre

customer_reviews.title: BEST lipo charger!
customer_reviews.text: This charger is awesome! Works great and very versatile! It charges pretty much all my RC heli/drone batteries from xk k110 (1s 450mah), xk k120 (2s 300mah), blade 180CFX (3s 450mah), and all my 4S race drones. You need not no other charger :). Just only charge ONE battery at a time of course, and if there is one con to this charger, it's that I'm not such a big fan of the power brick style of wall adapter. I would rather have a normal wall plug, idk what's the official name. Other than that, just an awesome charger, and I confirm that it did work for my 4s 1,500mah battery as well.
customer_reviews.author: War1029

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Cheap in cost but works well so far. I'm charging a 1300 mah 3s lipo with a xt30. Charges in 2 hours tops. Update: Sometimes I get a error, which is a blinking red light, so I have to unplug & plug back in until it stops. I'm not sure why this happens a lot so I just keep the power on to avoid that. I added pictures to answer the compatibility questions.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B

customer_reviews.title: Great product for money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this charger to charge Syma X8C and Syma X8W drone's Li-Po batteries. It is reasonably priced, the charging takes about 1 hour 30 minutes. This charger charges and balances cells, and disconnects once done. Since it is cheap, I suggest to buy one charger for each spare battery you have for your drone, so you can charge all of them simultaneously. Overall, I am very satisfied with my purchase, and can recommend this product to anybody who needs cheap and reliable charger for Li-Po batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Viktor Sv

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: This is a great balancing charger for Lipo, LIon and LiFe batteries. It works great and is an attractive price. Pro's: Small and light. Charges 3 different battery chemistries. Balance charges 4 different battery sizes, 1S, 2S, 3S and 4S. External Power Supply therefore can use a car-lighter cable (not included). Does not get hot. Con's: Slower than some other chargers. No lights to tell how far along it is. Only charging vs finished. As inexpensive as this is, you can have 2 or more running to get your batteries up to charge. And can even run the charger from a car battery so you can charge your batteries in the field. Great, compact, practical device.
customer_reviews.author: NotSmall

customer_reviews.title: A must for quadcopter flyers
customer_reviews.text: One year of heavy duty weekend use with our drone fleet (Syma X11, X51, JJRC Crab, 3 Syma X8, 3 Syma X5 and other brushless drones). No issues. Up to 12 charges per weekend of Syma X8 batteries and /or 10 Syma X5 packs. Had to purchase another one to keep up with charging needs. Price/ value ratio is great. No issues up to now. Reliable.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER BARBOUR MARTINEZ

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work!!
customer_reviews.text: The charger I received looked used it was not the same one in the description and didn't even work. I tried to charge my MJX Bugs 2 battery with it, I let it charge for over an hour then checked the battery and the voltage never changed. I then plugged a fully charged MJX battery on it and the red charging light stayed on and never turned green to indicate the battery was charged. I"m sending this back today.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to charge a Tesla-style lithium ion battery pack I built for my son's large Ram power wheels. The charger is permanently mounted to a 24x 18650 4S pack under the seat. The charger's plug runs up the roll bar and hard mounted making it easy to plug an extension cord directly into the vehicle. This is summer #2 with the charger getting used every other night. It charges the huge 4S pack overnight, doesn't get hot, and keeps the truck running. Dad tested, mother approved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than B3 balance charger.
customer_reviews.text: I got a B3 balance charger with my rtf eaching falcon 180 and have been using that but wanted to move up to 4s for more power as my skill has increased but the B3 doesnt do 4 cells as well as this one is also like twice as fast at charging my batteries and balances them much better.
customer_reviews.author: Aleks DiNaro

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend, Only Charger You'll Need!
customer_reviews.text: Great Charger and offers a variety of different ports to charge from 1s-4s batteries, charges my 4s lipos within an hour or 2, and its ease of use is great! And i'm super satisfied that it has some type of charging awareness so when the battery is full it doesnt keep trying to charge it, very similar to how Dji chargers are but for FPV
customer_reviews.author: Richie Picasso

customer_reviews.title: They just stop working
customer_reviews.text: On my third one. they just stop working. Customer support is non existant
customer_reviews.author: stan pappy

customer_reviews.title: Its junk
customer_reviews.text: Third time using it and it doesnt work any more. I thought with amazon promoting it and having nearly 300 reviews it must be at least decent but that is definitely not the case
customer_reviews.author: Pat B

customer_reviews.title: Great Balanced Charger
customer_reviews.text: This charger is really nice. The balanced ports and simple operation make charging a breeze. Plug it in, attach the battery, and wait for the red light to turn green. Simple and awesome. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Debleigh Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: You really need the charger that will connect to both ...
customer_reviews.text: You really need the charger that will connect to both plugs on the lipo battery. This one doesn’t always give a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Swarny

customer_reviews.title: Defective charger twice
customer_reviews.text: I had bought the charger and it was defective. I got a replacement and it worked one time perfectly, the second time I tried using it , the charging light started blinking which means that the charger is defective. I at first thought maybe it was the battery that was bad but I tried it on my friends and it didn’t have the same issue. I honestly don’t know if it was just bad luck on my side but it is the first time I’ve ever had a problem with their products.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended!
customer_reviews.text: Light plastic body, don't Chuck it around after a bad day on the field ;) it charges well from my understanding, doesn't overheat, but please always practice battery saftey..
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Keller

customer_reviews.title: It's a simple charger. Not much to it. ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a simple charger. Not much to it. However, it does work well and it hasn't given me any trouble. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Lipo Charger...
customer_reviews.text: Just need a smart lipo charger for my batteries that use for airsoft at a good price range. Work very good by the way.

customer_reviews.title: Not Charging fully
customer_reviews.text: When I got it I was really pleased with it, worked great. However, after about a month of use, it didn't charge my battery's fully, it only charged them about 7%. This might be an issue that was coincidental, ordering a new one and hopefully won't have to get new batteries as well. Would not rely on this product.

customer_reviews.title: Good charge !
customer_reviews.text: It could be sold together with the battery, more considered a great product and fulfills what it promises.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product works awesome 5 stars all the way recommend it if you have a Lipo battery

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Takes a while to charge up a 3s but i dont really need a quick charger and for the price i dont mind waiting
customer_reviews.author: Wes H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger!
customer_reviews.text: No wonder this is Amazon's choice. It charged my LiPO 7.4v 1800mAh batteries in record time. Forget the rest and buy the best! HappyJack

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: as many reviewers have already said, seems to work really well, doesn't get very hot and is from a known quality brand. all in all, what i expected and am happy with the purchase and product.
customer_reviews.author: Stix

customer_reviews.title: Works great for charging small LIPO packs! Like the one in my QX7
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little charge for on-the-go charging. This charger has saved me once when my QX7 battery died and I had to jump into Starbucks and charge it up. Works as advertised, 1A charging, not fast, not slow, but works reliable.

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: I use this charger for my airsoft batteries and it perfectly works. It has multiple ports which is very convenient, you can charge any other types of batteries. I also charged the battery from my drone. Overall, I am satisfied with the product.

customer_reviews.text: It's so simple! Can take a long time to charge if the battery is low and has a high capacity my highest is a 2000mAH 11.1v 20C matrix lipo and when charging that long the charger gets very warm not hot but quite warm so monitor it as your battery chargers. I'd definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Charged fast
customer_reviews.text: Best LiPO charger I've tried yet, all the other one's I owned you don't know when it's fully charged, this one turns green when done. It's awesome! Charged fast and didn't get hot at all!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect charger with easy indicators and simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect charger with easy indicators and simple to use. Used it on my 11.1V Lipo

I'm using this to charge 4000mah MultiStar batteries for my drone. I was impressed with the performance for the price and bought a second charger. Would highly recommend!

customer_reviews.author: Athanasios Tsagris

customer_reviews.title: This should be the charger that comes with all lithium ...
customer_reviews.text: This should be the charger that comes with all lithium cell powered RC cars. Very fast, safe and efficient charging every time!

customer_reviews.title: Nice charger.
customer_reviews.text: It's a quick, easy, simple, low priced lipo charger. What more can you ask for? Though i recommend you still follow lipo safety procedures by charging your lipos inside of a lipo "safe" bag, and always be present when charging lipos with this thing...

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, practical and also if you accidentally put the battery cords flipped, it will blink to warn you.

customer_reviews.title: 1A output, not good for small batteries
customer_reviews.text: The charger looked great, but I was unable to test it on my small 300 mAh batteries. With a 1C charge rate you'll want at least 1000 mAh or 2C of 500 mAh. Would be great if the seller updated the description to include output current rating.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works just as it should. Charges fast, automatically turns off, notifies you when your charge is complete (Green LED) and when the device is charging a battery (Red LED).

customer_reviews.title: I REALLY RECOMMEND IT FOR THE PRICE

customer_reviews.title: Great band for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job charging. I have probably recharged each of my six batteries over a dozen times each and they still work like new. Charge time on a 3S 2200mah Turnigy Nano-Tech is almost 90 minutes from 11.5V to 12.6V.

customer_reviews.title: Great basic charger
customer_reviews.text: Very simple and basic but does its task very well. Doesn't have any functions such as discharge or storage charge. I'm using this charger for my quad copter batteries and it was a great value from a manufacturer I know well.

I will update this review if Tenergy will replace this item. After the 1st contact message, i am feeling like Tenergy will backup their products. For that they get 5 stars

I have several 2s and 3s LiPo's of different Mah and its not a fast charger, but thats better for your batteries anyhow!

product_meta.title: Tenergy TN267 1-4 Cells Li-Po/Li-Fe Balance Charger for Airsoft & RC Car Battery Packs with 1S to 4S XH Type Balance Connector
feature_bullets: HOBBY BALANCE CHARGER - Power many your hobbies with one Tenergy TN267 RC balance charger. Automatically ensure 1S to 4S Li-Po/Li-Fe cells are fully balance charged for airsoft guns, RC cars, RC helicopters, and RC quadcopters.

COMPACT & USER FRIENDLY - The simple LED indicators on this airsoft battery charger quickly alerts you to the battery status. Use this lightweight and compact charger anywhere with the worldwide voltage 100V-240V external AC adapter.
WIDE VOLTAGE COMPATIBILITY - Choose between Li-Po and Li-Fe with a switch, and use this battery pack balance charger to recharge 1-4 cells on LiPo/Li-ion 3.7V-14.8V or LiFePO4 3.2V-12.8V batteries.
SAFETY PROTECTIONS -TN267 LiPo battery charger has built-in safety protections against reverse polarity, short circuit, over-charge, and over-current protection.

TENERGY WARRANTY - Buy with confidence, Tenergy 11.1V battery charger for Airsoft includes a 12-month warranty. This charger has been certified based on international CE safety standards and the adapter includes UL certification.
